name: PowerBeat
description:
There is no progress bar! Please wait until game is loading...

Leave feedback and rate game here: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-35/?action=preview&uid=43734

My new music arcade game, maded on Ludum Dare 35!
You goal: collect 3 keys, open boss room and defeat the boss!
And you have only 3 minutes...

Controls:
==========
Move: Arrows or WASD
Restart: R (if you stuck or failed with boxes ;))
Space to start in menu.

Hints:
=========
Read the in-game hints!
Also there is cheat, to instantly open boss gates. Just walk around on map to see how!
